text:
We are facing issues where the sessions are not being expired
and eventually causing a stack overflow.

We see that at some point the sessions get pilled up and we need to manually expire those sessions through the manager application, or until we will restart tomcat but after a few hours / days, sessions will start to get stuck again

We see it in all the applications that are deployed on tomcat, including the manager application - this rules out (in my opinion) the possibility that its an issue with our application.

Please advise.

Thanks,
